questions: Is there an old man in a fabric smock splattering paint in the image?
Is there a young man in wooden goggles and an oversized t-shirt in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: an old man in a smock splattering paint alongside a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles?
Is the smock made of fabric?
Are the goggles made of wood?
model_output:
yes The image shows an old man wearing a fabric smock and splattering paint.
no There is no young man wearing wooden goggles; the goggles appear to be made of another material.
yes The image does show an old man in a smock splattering paint next to a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles, creating a contrast between them.
yes The smock appears to be made of fabric based on its texture and appearance.
no The goggles are not made of wood; they have a reflective surface suggesting a different material.
